QuestData.Title: Savage Vengeance
QuestData.Description: The Thunderlord are a blight $n.$b$b<Ruk'gan spits in disgust.>$b$bMy daughter, Grishna, was killed by those monsters. Only their blood will bring me peace now.$b$bIf you would help me then I need you to cause a distraction so I can sneak to a position closer to their camp.$b$bKilling a few of their so called "Iron Thunderguard" would be perfect.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 Iron Thunderguards within the Bones of Agurak in Frostfire Ridge.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well, $c.$b$bNow before we can continue our assault we need to look for any supplies in the area that could help our fight.
